department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系生物醫學工程碩士班
department.en: Master Program in Biomedical Engineering, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: “Nano-scale technology is the trend of current techniques, and plays a crucial role in the development of emerging technology. In the 21 century, nanotechnology is no longer a sub-discipline of any specific science and/or engineering field. It represents the convergence of various areas, and demands a new paradigm for lesson. The goal of this class is to help students comprehensively understand the materials, manufacture, principles, and applications of nanotechnologies with emphases on the biotechnology and biosciences.“
goal.en: “Nano-scale technology is the trend of current techniques, and plays a crucial role in the development of emerging technology. In the 21 century, nanotechnology is no longer a sub-discipline of any specific science and/or engineering field. It represents the convergence of various areas, and demands a new paradigm for lesson. The goal of this class is to help students comprehensively understand the materials, manufacture, principles, and applications of nanotechnologies with emphases on the biotechnology and biosciences.“

outline.ch:
1 Class Introduction
2 Introd8uction of Nanotechnology
3 Characterizations and Preparations of Nanomaterials
4 Measurement ＆ Analysis of Nanomaterials
5 Nanotechnology in Chemistry ＆ Chemical Engineering
6 Nanotechnology
7 Nano-Biotechnology (I)
8 Midterm Exam
9 Nano-Biotechnolgy (II)
10 Nano-Drug for Cancer Therapy
11 Nano-scale Probes
12 Nano-Carbon Technology
13 Nanostructured Collagen Mimics in Tissue Engineering
14 Nanotechnologies for Cellular and Molecular Imaging by MRI
15 Final Presentation
16 Final Exam

textbook.ch:
“1. Claudio Nicolini. Nanobiotechnology ＆ Nanobiosciences. 2009, Pan Stanford Publishing
2. Mick Wilson et al. Nanotechnology (Basic science and emerging technologies). 2002, Chapman ＆ Hall/CRC
3. Challa S.S.R. Kumar, Josef Hormes, and Carola Leuschner. Nanofabrication Towards Biomedical Applications. 2005. Wiley-VCH Verlag GmbH ＆ Co. KGaA.“
textbook.en:
“1. Claudio Nicolini. Nanobiotechnology ＆ Nanobiosciences. 2009, Pan Stanford Publishing
2. Mick Wilson et al. Nanotechnology (Basic science and emerging technologies). 2002, Chapman ＆ Hall/CRC
3. Challa S.S.R. Kumar, Josef Hormes, and Carola Leuschner. Nanofabrication Towards Biomedical Applications. 2005. Wiley-VCH Verlag GmbH ＆ Co. KGaA.“

flexDiscription.ch: 第17,18周視課程需要進行安排實作/見習教學或企業參訪。
flexDiscription.en: In the 17th and 18th week, we will arrange hands-on lecture or company visiting if available.
